name: smdb
description: Simple Movie DataBase - Just your basic movie database that tracks only Movies, Actors and Directors. I chose SMDB because it creates all the relational database scenarios (Movies have one director, a director may have many movies, Actors will star in many movies and a movie will be starred in by many actors). The application will initially use the MERN stack but will have forks where the code has been refactored to use other frameworks.
author: dpollan
